text: ‘‘nanu nanaginta hinde idda taurat‌na bhagavannu samarthisuvavanagiddene hagu nim'ma mele nisid'dha golisalagidda kelavu visayagalannu nim'ma palige sam'matagolisalikkagi bandiruttene. Nanu nim'ma balige nim'ma odeyana kadeyinda puraveyannu tandiruttene. (Adudarinda) nivu allahanige anjiri mattu nanna adesa palisiri’’
